info.title: Sample JSON:API OAS File
info.description: Example file on how a JSON:API compliant API can be described in OAS v3+

get.description: A longer MEANINGFUL descripition. Do not copy summary.

id.description: a unique identifier for this particular occurrence of the problem

links.description: links that lead to further detail about the particular occurrence of the problem

status.description: the HTTP status code applicable to this problem

title.description: a human-readable summary specific of the problem. Usually the http status friendly name.

detail.description: a human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem

source.description: an object containing references to the source of the error

pointer.description: a JSON Pointer [RFC6901] to the associated entity in the request document

parameter.description: a string indicating which URI query parameter caused the error

403.description: Forbidden: Request does not have necessary permissions

ApiKeyAuth.description: Api Key value. First level of client identification and access control to proxy/gateway
ApiKeyAuth.name: api-key

scopes.actions:write: modify actions the end-user has access to
scopes.actions:read: read actions the end-user has access to
scopes.actions:delete: delete actions the end-user has access to
